instructions: Open the Phone app. At the bottom, tap the dial pad icon. Touch and hold 1. If prompted, enter your voicemail password.
Open the Phone app. Tap Voicemail (which is denoted as an envelope). If you don't see it, make sure Visual Voicemail is enabled. Proceed to listen and manage your voicemails.

Sign up for a YouMail account if you don't have one. Open your favorite browser and navigate to YouMail, then select Sign In . Enter your credentials, then select Sign In . Your new voicemails are listed in the Recent Messages section. Select the Play icon next to the voicemail you want to listen to or tap Inbox to see more messages. In your Inbox, select the desired message. Note the options you can choose from in the lower-right corner: Forward , Delete , Save , Notes , Replay , and Block . Manage your voicemail from any device that supports YouMail.
